#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Survive a Family Reunion
#Text=Family reunions sound different to all of us .
#Text=Some Tweens would think , yay family time !
#Text=Most tweens would think , OMG , worst night of my life , the kids are annoying , old people are scary-that sort of thing .
#Text=Well , here is how to survive it .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Bring a pad of lined paper , a book , or iPod touch .
#Text=Then before you leave , print out hard math sheets [ but make sure you have the answers ] to pretend to do .
#Text=Other types of worksheets or real homework is acceptable .
#Text=If your parents say no , bring a book and pretend is it class reading .
#Text=When you arrive , you will probably receive over excited hellos and hugs .
#Text=One subtle way to show you do not want to be bothered is to stand in a pencil position and do not open your arms .
#Text=Amusing yourself .
#Text=First , inform someone where you are going .
#Text=Do not inform a young kid , and old person or your parents .
#Text=Maybe a cousin , or a more childish adult .
#Text=The go to the sitting area and read[or play on your iPod touch , or draw ] .
#Text=Do not barricade yourself behind a chair , or on the floor in the corner .
#Text=That will make you more conspicuous .
#Text=When dinner is called GO TO THE TABLE .
#Text=If you have a choice , it is best to sit a t the corner , near a baby , a quiet teenager , anyone who knows what you are doing .
#Text=If the dinner is started with prayers bow your head and mumble .
#Text=Under the table read , draw , or play iPhone with the VOLUME DOWN .
#Text=Take small portions of food to have another excuse to get more .
#Text=You can also use napkins as an excuse .
#Text=Dessert is sometimes the only enjoyable part .
#Text=Again , take small portions or messy food .
#Text=If you get messy and small portions , this will give an excuse to get up to get napkins or seconds .
#Text=In my family , we read stories form the bible before and after dinner .
#Text=If you cannot read , Hebrew , Chinese , or your religious language , mention it to the host quietly during dessert .
#Text=If you then are asked to read English , DO NOT MUMBLE in the vain hope you will not have to read it .
#Text=Speak clearly .
#Text=If there are words you do not feel comfortable saying , simple skip them by ' accident ' or say them wrong .
#Text=Do not change t he word .
#Text=If games are played , play quietly and do not be competitive .
#Text=If you can worm your way out of playing , good for you .
#Text=If you win say something like .
#Text=" Yay ! " or " Wow !

column1: #Text=Boys , the usual .
#Text=Slacks , loafers , but wear a t-shirt .
#Text=If you have dyed hair wear a hat .
#Text=If you have a tattoo , or piercings , try to cover them up/take them out .
#Text=Girls should wear a soft cotton top , ballet or long sleeve .
#Text=No neon .
#Text=I recommend baby 's bedroom colors .
#Text=Where colored jeans .
#Text=Not brights , but black , rust , and other dark colors .
#Text=Where Toms or sandals .
#Text=Old people think high heels can only be worn by people 30 and over .
#Text=Basic Dress Rules : No skinny jeans , no shorts , no short skirts , no crop tops , no netted shirts , no off the shoulder , no tank tops , no tees with objectionable slogans .
#Text=In short do n't wear anything high fashion .
#Text=Warnings
#Text=Have something minimized such as a math site like IXL , a vocabulary web site or a typing practice game .
#Text=If someone starts coming over , open it up .
#Text=Before hand memorize these excuses if someone sees your amusement activity :
#Text=1 .
#Text=We 'll you know how hard this work is .
#Text=These are hard math problems , so they require a lot of thinking .
#Text=2 .
#Text=Everyone gets tired from work .
#Text=Anyway , I should get back to work .
#Text=I need complete silence .
#Text=3 .
#Text=If it is not a common game , like temple run is , say it is a quick thinking exercise .
